meta.description: Determine the number of bags of regular and premium dog food to mix in order to minimize cost while meeting nutritional requirements.

sets.name: BRANDS
sets.description: Types of dog food brands available.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per bag of each brand.

params.name: calcium
params.description: Units of calcium per bag of each brand.

params.name: vitamin_mix
params.description: Units of vitamin mix per bag of each brand.

params.name: protein
params.description: Units of protein per bag of each brand.

vars.name: bags
vars.description: Number of bags to purchase for each brand.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of purchasing dog food bags.

constraints.name: calcium_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 15 units of calcium.

constraints.name: vitamin_mix_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 20 units of vitamin mix.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 20 units of protein.
